// Pivot 0, 0
int leftblock[14] = {
	137, 151,
	137, 123,
	147, 123,
	147, 143,
	147, 151,
	145, 157,
	139, 157
};

// Pivot 0.000000, 0.000000
float leftblock[14] = {
	0.371274f, 0.251667f,
	0.371274f, 0.205000f,
